@template public
{{div: class=white}}
{{div2: class=container}}

{{ contact_form: receiver_email:info@mothership1.com | custom | subject: Contact Form Mothership1 }}
    {{div3: class=form-group}}
        {{html: <label class="control-label col-md-1" for="sender_email">Email</label>}}
        {{div4: class=col-md-4}}
            {{ email: name=sender_email | required | placeholder=Email | class=form-control}}
        {{div4}}
    {{div3}}
    {{div3: class=form-group}}
        {{html: <label class="control-label col-md-1" for="sender_name">Name</label>}}
        {{div4: class=col-md-4}}
            {{ text: name=sender_name | required=true | placeholder=Name | class=form-control}}
        {{div4}}
    {{div3}}
    {{div3: class=form-group }}
        {{html: <label class="control-label col-md-1" for="body">Message</label>}}
        {{div4: class=col-md-4}}
            {{ textarea: rows=10 | cols=20 | required | name=body | class=form-control}}
        {{div4}}
    {{div3}}

    {{div3: class=form-group}}
        {{html: <label class="control-label col-md-1"></label>}}
        {{div4: class=col-md-4}}
            {{ submit: class=btn btn-primary | data-loading-text=Sending... }}
                {{html: Send}}
            {{submit}}

            {{ reset }}
        {{div4}}
    {{div3}}
{{ contact_form }}

@divend
@divend
